name: Vitelle
description: Vitelle is a data-driven female longevity platform that creates and adapts longevity protocols specifically for the female body. We give women more healthy years in the future by bridging the gap between their health at home and their clinical care.
one_liner: Vitelle is a data-driven female longevity platform that creates and adapts longevity protocols specifically for the female body. We give women more healthy years in the future by bridging the gap between their health at home and their clinical care.
